name: Mattermark, Inc.
description: Provider of a platform intended to search companies and investors and create smart customer list through business-intelligence. The company's platform offers actionable insights by syncing informative fields to finalize deals, integrates products, systems, business processes and directly updates data into Google Sheets or Microsoft Excel and provides live updates of company growth scores, funding, enabling businesses to apply triggers and actions on leads and opportunities with the relevant information from inside salesforce.
one_liner: Provider of a platform intended to search companies and investors and create smart customer list through business-intelligence. The company's platform offers actionable insights by syncing informative fields to finalize deals, integrates products, systems, business processes and directly updates data into Google Sheets or Microsoft Excel and provides live updates of company growth scores, funding, enabling businesses to apply triggers and actions on leads and opportunities with the relevant information from inside salesforce.
